result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael J Rooney was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Violate/Harassment Restraining Order - Injunction, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.125(7).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 6/27/22: Defendant entitled to 1 day credit if revoked.

miscConds.notes:
All Financial obligations shall be paid to the Clerk of Courts within 60 days unless a payment plan is established. 
Shall submit a DNA sample and pay surcharge.

Defendant shall undergo and participate in a Mental Health Assessment and follow through with any recommendations resulting therefrom. Defendant shall undergo and follow through with any counseling and/or treatment as recommended by Agent.

Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone. 

Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle unless he has a valid Wisconsin driver's license.
Comply with the terms of injunction in 21CV414.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Probation Intake Order

2:00 PM Court calls 22CM4, 22CM33, 22CT36 & 22CT50.  Defendant Michael J Rooney in court.  Attorney Gilbert Grant Thompson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michael Robert Devitt in court for Michael J Rooney. Court finds victim rights compliant.  Attorney Thompson reviews joint agreement.  Parties acknowledge approval w/agreement.  Court questions defendant and reviews chgs and pens.  Defendant enters NC plea in Count 1 in 22CM4 and Count 3 in 22CT36.  Court accepts plea and finds defendant Guilty. Count 1 in 22CM33;  Counts 1 & 2 in 22CT36 and Count 1 in 22CT50 are DRI.  Victim in 22CM4 makes statement. Attorney Thompson heard on sentencing recommendation.  Attorney Devitt heard.  Defendant waives statement.  Court heard and imposes sentence as follows:

Count 1 - 20CM4 & 
withheld sentence - 18 mos probation

COP
pay court costs
comply w/terms of injunction in 21CV414
no violent or abusive contact w/anyone
participate in mental health assessment and follow through w/recommendations
no operation of motor vehicle w/o valid driver license
any counseling per agent

Count 3 - 22CT36
w/held sentence - 18 mos probation - concurrent to 20CM4
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 20, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

3:01 PM - 22CM04, 22CM33, 22CT36 & 22CT50 - Prosecuting attorney Gilbert Grant Thompson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael J Rooney in court.  Attorney Michael Robert Devitt in court for Michael J Rooney. Report received. Atty Devitt heard; not willing to waive. Defendant stands mute. Dr Schoenecker s/t by phone. Exhibit List prepared. ADA Thompson heard. Court heard; finds competent to proceed. Discussion on scheduling. Atty Devitt heard; enters plea to Not Guilty/Not Guilty by Mental Disease/Defect in all cases. Court sets TSC.
Telephone scheduling conference scheduled for May 20, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Telephone scheduling conference on May 20, 2022 at 08:45 am.

Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with victim  Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

10:31 AM Defendant Michael J Rooney in court with attorney Michael Robert Devitt.  Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Devitt raises competency; Court orders comp eval; Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court finds probable cause. Court enters Not Guilty plea. RD & JT set. Court sets $500 PA bond with conditions:  Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with victim;   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division. Competency hearing TBD

08:16 AM Defendant, Michael J Rooney in court, Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Petition filed. Discussion held. Court appoints Atty Mike Devitt at rate of $100/month comm 3/3/22.
